title: Gaz International Sells Its SIBẺIAN Oil Opẻatión to Local Company
question: Question 171. What is true about Gaz International?
options: A. It is a Russian-owned company.
B. It took control of another company.
C. Its stock price has slipped due to a false rumor.
D. It was involved in a multi-million dollar transaction recently.
correct: D. It was involved in a multi-million dollar transaction recently.

question: Question 172. Which of the following will be the result of a deal mentioned in the article?
options: A. Gaz International will become the leading company in its field.
B. Yevgeni Star seems to have gotten the better end of the deal.
C. Gaz International will now focus on establishing its business in new areas.
D. Yevgeni Star will distribute shares to its top management staff.
correct: C. Gaz International will now focus on establishing its business in new areas.

question: Question 173. Who is Mr. Fritz Faschier?
options: A. A reporter for a local newspaper
B. The president of Gaz International
C. A spokesperson for Yevgeni Star
D. A Russian authority
correct: B. The president of Gaz International

question: Question 174. According to the article, when will the deal be finalized?
options: B. In five years
C. Within the following weeks
D. By early next year
correct: D. By early next year

question: Question 175. What is the main cause of the delay in closing the deal?
options: A. Both companies want to take it slow.
B. Some complications have surfaced regarding legal issues.
C. The Russian authorities usually take a long time to process a new license.
D. There are many details to be worked out.
correct: D. There are many details to be worked out.

title:
Dear Ms. Lawrence,

Your subscription to Travelways Magazine is up for renewal in just a few issues. Please fill out the attached renewal form, and mail back the pre-paid card in order to prevent any disruption in your service.
question: 1. Why was the first letter written?
options: A. To inform an existing customer about a new kind of magazine
B. To remind someone of an upcoming subscription renewal
C. To notify a customer of a payment made
D. To solicit the magazine to get a new customer
correct: B. To remind someone of an upcoming subscription renewal

question: 2. According to the first letter, what is an added advantage of responding within the next month?
options: A. A savings of 80% off the cover price will be provided.
B. A surprise gift will be sent along with the first issue.
C. A number of issues will be given away at no cost.
D. An annual package of travel coupons will be mailed.
correct: C. A number of issues will be given away at no cost.

question: 3. How does Ms. Lawrence respond?
